MachineTranslateCaching.description: Boolean. Whether to enable caching for translation subpages.

MachineTranslateCachingTime.description: Integer. The time in seconds to cache translations for.

MachineTranslateLibreTranslateUrl.description: String. URL of the LibreTranslate instance to use.

MachineTranslateRobotPolicy.description: String. The robot policy to use for translation subpages.

MachineTranslateSuppressLanguageCaption.description: Boolean. Whether to suppress (disable) the language caption on translation subpages.

MachineTranslateTimeout.description: Integer. The time in seconds before connecting to the MachineTranslate instance will timeout.

MachineTranslateTranslateTitle.description: Boolean. Whether to also translate the page title. This will create an extra request to the translation API.

MachineTranslateUseJobQueue.description: Boolean. Whether to use the job queue for processing translations.
